message: Let's be fair and split close to 50/50, Bob. I get a slight advantage since I'm being generous in proposing first.
I'm willing to take a bit more since you got to propose first and I'm taking on the 5% inflation risk by not accepting your initial offer.
Bob, let's stop wasting time. We're losing money due to inflation.  A 50/50 split is the fairest and most logical outcome.
